title: Sentiment Analysis Project
description: Build a sentiment classifier using NLP
requirements: Use Python with NLTK or spaCy. Dataset: movie reviews. Accuracy target: 85%

title: Image Classification Challenge
requirements: Use PyTorch or TensorFlow. Minimum 10000 images. Accuracy > 90%

title: Time Series Forecasting
requirements: Stock market or weather data. Use pandas and scikit-learn

title: Clustering Analysis
requirements: K-means or DBSCAN. 3-5 clusters. Explain insights

title: Text Summarization
requirements: Use transformers. Test on news articles

title: Neural Network from Scratch
description: Implement a neural network in NumPy

title: Decision Tree Implementation
requirements: Train and test on iris dataset
